original_text: As he looked, he saw a well in the field, and behold, three flocks of sheep lying beside it, for out of that well the flocks were watered. The stone on the well's mouth was large,
korean_text: 본즉 들에 우물이 있고 그 곁에 양 세 떼가 누워 있으니 이는 목자들이 그 우물에서 양 떼에게 물을 먹임이라 큰 돌로 우물 아귀를 덮었다가

sentences.original_text: he saw a well in the field,
three flocks of sheep lying beside it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 곁에는 양 떼 세 떼가 누워 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: for out of that well the flocks were watered.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 우물에서 양 떼들이 물을 마셨기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: The stone on the well's mouth was large,
